body: 1. There seems to be no way to copy the start/end dates which could be useful for the search query 2. On the above picture you can move mouse near the start date and it will show you the three icons, one next to the workflow type and two next to the start date, but all of these operate on the workflow type, not the start date. I got confused thinking the second set of icons would copy my start date but they copied the workflow type only.
title: Advanced search: no way to copy start/end dates + type copy confusing
